location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Messrs Remington

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Letter informing them that Narayn Wussadeojee will pay the calls referred to in their previous letter and that his balance in their hands of 8207-2-6 rupees, his balance in the old bank of 1650 rupees, and his Â£500 stock in the Baroda rail should all be put towards the purchase of new shares.
